description: Detailed analysis for a specific workload - usage patterns, resource configuration, and recommendations. Part of the Resource Consumption Analysis suite.

panels.description: Time series showing CPU consumption for the selected workload compared to request, limit, and advised values.

targets.expr:
sum(
  rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{namespace="$namespace", container!="", image!=""}[$__rate_interval])
  * on(pod, namespace) group_left()
  (group by (pod, namespace, created_by_name, created_by_kind) (kube_pod_info{namespace="$namespace", created_by_kind=~"$workload_kinds", created_by_name=~"$workload(-[a-z0-9]{8,10}|-[0-9]+)?"}))
) * 1000

panels.title: ðŸ”¥ CPU Usage: $workload

panels.description: Time series showing memory consumption for the selected workload compared to request, limit, and advised values.
panels.title: ðŸ’¾ Memory Usage: $workload

panels.description: Current CPU usage as percentage of configured request.
panels.title: CPU % of Request

panels.description: Current CPU usage as percentage of configured limit.
panels.title: CPU % of Limit

panels.description: Current memory usage as percentage of configured request.
panels.title: Memory % of Request

panels.description: Current memory usage as percentage of configured limit.
panels.title: Memory % of Limit

panels.description: Current CPU request configured in the workload.
panels.title: CPU Request (m)

panels.description: Current memory request configured in the workload.
panels.title: Mem Request (MiB)

panels.description: CPU consumption broken down by individual pod.

targets.expr:
sum by (pod) (
  rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{namespace="$namespace", container!="", image!=""}[$__rate_interval])
  * on(pod, namespace) group_left()
  (group by (pod, namespace, created_by_name, created_by_kind) (kube_pod_info{namespace="$namespace", created_by_kind=~"$workload_kinds", created_by_name=~"$workload(-[a-z0-9]{8,10}|-[0-9]+)?"}))
) * 1000

panels.title: CPU Usage per Pod

panels.description: Memory consumption broken down by individual pod.
panels.title: Memory Usage per Pod

panels.description: Number of running pods for this workload.
panels.title: Pod Count

panels.description: Current CPU limit configured in the workload manifest.
panels.title: CPU Limit (m)

panels.description: Current memory limit configured in the workload manifest.
panels.title: Mem Limit (MiB)

panels.description:
CPU usage compared to current and simulated (Normal profile) request/limit values.

Normal Profile Rules:
- Simulated Request = P90
- Simulated Limit = P99 Ã— 1.5

targets.expr:
sum(
  rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{namespace="$namespace", container!="", image!=""}[$__rate_interval])
  * on(pod, namespace) group_left()
  (group by (pod, namespace, created_by_name, created_by_kind) (kube_pod_info{namespace="$namespace", created_by_kind=~"$workload_kinds", created_by_name=~"$workload(-[a-z0-9]{8,10}|-[0-9]+)?"}))
) * 1000

quantile_over_time(0.90,
  sum(
    rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{namespace="$namespace", container!="", image!=""}[$__rate_interval])
    * on(pod, namespace) group_left()
    (group by (pod, namespace, created_by_name, created_by_kind) (kube_pod_info{namespace="$namespace", created_by_kind=~"$workload_kinds", created_by_name=~"$workload(-[a-z0-9]{8,10}|-[0-9]+)?"}))
  )[$__range:$__rate_interval]
) * 1000

quantile_over_time(0.99,
  sum(
    rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{namespace="$namespace", container!="", image!=""}[$__rate_interval])
    * on(pod, namespace) group_left()
    (group by (pod, namespace, created_by_name, created_by_kind) (kube_pod_info{namespace="$namespace", created_by_kind=~"$workload_kinds", created_by_name=~"$workload(-[a-z0-9]{8,10}|-[0-9]+)?"}))
  )[$__range:$__rate_interval]
) * 1000 * 1.5

panels.title: ðŸ”¥ CPU with Normal Profile Simulation

panels.description:
Memory usage compared to current and simulated (Normal profile) request/limit values.

Normal Profile Rules:
- Simulated Request = P95
- Simulated Limit = Max Ã— 1.2
panels.title: ðŸ’¾ Memory with Normal Profile Simulation

panels.description:
CPU usage compared to current and simulated (Aggressive profile) request/limit values.

Aggressive Profile Rules:
- Simulated Request = P95 Ã— 1.1
- Simulated Limit = Max Ã— 1.25

targets.expr:
sum(
  rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{namespace="$namespace", container!="", image!=""}[$__rate_interval])
  * on(pod, namespace) group_left()
  (group by (pod, namespace, created_by_name, created_by_kind) (kube_pod_info{namespace="$namespace", created_by_kind=~"$workload_kinds", created_by_name=~"$workload(-[a-z0-9]{8,10}|-[0-9]+)?"}))
) * 1000

quantile_over_time(0.95,
  sum(
    rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{namespace="$namespace", container!="", image!=""}[$__rate_interval])
    * on(pod, namespace) group_left()
    (group by (pod, namespace, created_by_name, created_by_kind) (kube_pod_info{namespace="$namespace", created_by_kind=~"$workload_kinds", created_by_name=~"$workload(-[a-z0-9]{8,10}|-[0-9]+)?"}))
  )[$__range:$__rate_interval]
) * 1000 * 1.1

max_over_time(
  sum(
    rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{namespace="$namespace", container!="", image!=""}[$__rate_interval])
    * on(pod, namespace) group_left()
    (group by (pod, namespace, created_by_name, created_by_kind) (kube_pod_info{namespace="$namespace", created_by_kind=~"$workload_kinds", created_by_name=~"$workload(-[a-z0-9]{8,10}|-[0-9]+)?"}))
  )[$__range:$__rate_interval]
) * 1000 * 1.25

panels.title: ðŸ”¥ CPU with Aggressive Profile Simulation

panels.description:
Memory usage compared to current and simulated (Aggressive profile) request/limit values.

Aggressive Profile Rules:
- Simulated Request = Max
- Simulated Limit = Max Ã— 1.25
panels.title: ðŸ’¾ Memory with Aggressive Profile Simulation

panels.description: Ratio between CPU limit and CPU request. Shows how much headroom is configured above the request.
panels.title: CPU Limit/Request Ratio

panels.description: Ratio between memory limit and memory request. Shows how much headroom is configured above the request.
panels.title: Memory Limit/Request Ratio

panels.description: Current CPU usage as percentage of simulated request (P90).

targets.expr:
(
  sum(rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{namespace="$namespace", container!="", image!=""}[$__rate_interval]) * on(pod, namespace) group_left() (group by (pod, namespace, created_by_name, created_by_kind) (kube_pod_info{namespace="$namespace", created_by_kind=~"$workload_kinds", created_by_name=~"$workload(-[a-z0-9]{8,10}|-[0-9]+)?"})))
  /
  quantile_over_time(0.90, sum(rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{namespace="$namespace", container!="", image!=""}[$__rate_interval]) * on(pod, namespace) group_left() (group by (pod, namespace, created_by_name, created_by_kind) (kube_pod_info{namespace="$namespace", created_by_kind=~"$workload_kinds", created_by_name=~"$workload(-[a-z0-9]{8,10}|-[0-9]+)?"})))[$__range:$__rate_interval])
) * 100

panels.title: CPU % of Sim Request

panels.description: Current CPU usage as percentage of simulated limit (P99 Ã— 1.5).

targets.expr:
(
  sum(rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{namespace="$namespace", container!="", image!=""}[$__rate_interval]) * on(pod, namespace) group_left() (group by (pod, namespace, created_by_name, created_by_kind) (kube_pod_info{namespace="$namespace", created_by_kind=~"$workload_kinds", created_by_name=~"$workload(-[a-z0-9]{8,10}|-[0-9]+)?"})))
  /
  (quantile_over_time(0.99, sum(rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{namespace="$namespace", container!="", image!=""}[$__rate_interval]) * on(pod, namespace) group_left() (group by (pod, namespace, created_by_name, created_by_kind) (kube_pod_info{namespace="$namespace", created_by_kind=~"$workload_kinds", created_by_name=~"$workload(-[a-z0-9]{8,10}|-[0-9]+)?"})))[$__range:$__rate_interval]) * 1.5)
) * 100

panels.title: CPU % of Sim Limit

panels.description: Current memory usage as percentage of simulated request (P95).

targets.expr:
(
  sum(container_memory_working_set_bytes{namespace="$namespace", container!="", image!=""} * on(pod, namespace) group_left() (group by (pod, namespace, created_by_name, created_by_kind) (kube_pod_info{namespace="$namespace", created_by_kind=~"$workload_kinds", created_by_name=~"$workload(-[a-z0-9]{8,10}|-[0-9]+)?"})))
  /
  quantile_over_time(0.95, sum(container_memory_working_set_bytes{namespace="$namespace", container!="", image!=""} * on(pod, namespace) group_left() (group by (pod, namespace, created_by_name, created_by_kind) (kube_pod_info{namespace="$namespace", created_by_kind=~"$workload_kinds", created_by_name=~"$workload(-[a-z0-9]{8,10}|-[0-9]+)?"})))[$__range:$__rate_interval])
) * 100

panels.title: Mem % of Sim Request

panels.description: Current memory usage as percentage of simulated limit (Max Ã— 1.2).

targets.expr:
(
  sum(container_memory_working_set_bytes{namespace="$namespace", container!="", image!=""} * on(pod, namespace) group_left() (group by (pod, namespace, created_by_name, created_by_kind) (kube_pod_info{namespace="$namespace", created_by_kind=~"$workload_kinds", created_by_name=~"$workload(-[a-z0-9]{8,10}|-[0-9]+)?"})))
  /
  (max_over_time(sum(container_memory_working_set_bytes{namespace="$namespace", container!="", image!=""} * on(pod, namespace) group_left() (group by (pod, namespace, created_by_name, created_by_kind) (kube_pod_info{namespace="$namespace", created_by_kind=~"$workload_kinds", created_by_name=~"$workload(-[a-z0-9]{8,10}|-[0-9]+)?"})))[$__range:$__rate_interval]) * 1.2)

list.description: Regex pattern to filter namespaces in query (e.g., "^prod-.*" or "staging|production"). Default ".*" shows all namespaces.
list.label: Namespace Filter
list.name: namespace_filter

list.description: Pod owner kinds to include in workload dropdown
list.label: Workload Kinds
list.name: workload_kinds

title: Resource Consumption Analysis - Workload Details
